EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Boston SI Replat Track
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Boston - June 29th, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Boston!
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days System Integrator Workshop: Replatforming Track When: June 29, 2017 Where: Cambridge Innovation Center, 1 Broadway, Cambridge, MA 02142
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
Remember to bring your laptops!
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in Boston!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
